lead_paragraph: A Nascar legend whose racing business has been weighed down by debt is part of an investment group that bought Richard Petty Motorsports for less than $50 million.
snippet: A Nascar legend whose racing business has been weighed down by debt is part of an investment group that bought Richard Petty Motorsports for less than $50 million.

headline.main: Richard Petty Is a Buyer in the Sale of Petty Motorsports
headline.seo: Richard Petty Is a Buyer in the Sale of Petty Motorsports
headline.print_headline:
SPORTS BRIEFING | AUTO RACING; Petty Motorsports,
Mired In Debt, Is Sold
